arts.ttl: Alan Shearer names only ONE Man United star in surprising combined XI with Liverpool - as England legend snubs Bruno Fernandes and the Reds' two record signings
arts.sum: Only one Manchester United star gets into a combined XI with Liverpool, according to Alan Shearer. Not even their talisman and captain Bruno Fernandes is afforded a space.

arts.ttl: Match of the Day host makes ruthless Liverpool vs Man Utd claim â€“ 'The worst'
arts.sum: Liverpool play host to Manchester United at Anfield on Sunday, and a fan-favourite Match of the Day host has given a brutal assessment of what's in store for the Red Devils

arts.ttl: Ibrahima Konate drops injury update after Arne Slot's comments before Liverpool vs Man Utd
arts.sum: Liverpool defender Ibrahima Konate was forced off during the Reds' defeat to Chelsea before the international break, and he was subsequently released from France duty due to a thigh injury

arts.ttl: Five players who could miss Liverpool vs Man Utd as Arne Slot sweats on two key players
arts.sum: Both Liverpool and Manchester United are set to be without key players for Sunday's huge Premier League clash at Anfield with Arne Slot's men looking to end their barren run of three straight defeats

arts.ttl: Isak, Wirtz, Mac Allister decisions: Predicted Liverpool XI vs. Man United
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Liverpool could line up for Sunday's Premier League clash with Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Amorim's midfield surprise: Predicted Man Utd XI vs. Liverpool
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Manchester United could line up for Sunday's Premier League clash with Liverpool.
